Feeding Hope.     Caring Community Friends (CCF) is Creek County's Largest Food Pantry.  Located at 12 W. Burnham Ave., in Sapulpa (Just W. of Main St. on Burnham Ave.)  CCF provides essential resources to financially disadvantaged individuals and families.  Service Area is limited to residents living in Eastern Creek County      http://www.ccfok.org", "notes": "FOOD PROGRAMS     Choice Pantry:  One visit per month, by appointment. Assortment of fresh, frozen, and shelf-stable foods + household essentials. Call 918-224-6464 to schedule.   Fresh Pass:  One visit per week, no appointment needed. Self-serve assortment of fresh foods.   Community Garden : Open daily to volunteers and visitors. Year-round. 14 W. Burnham, Sapulpa.   Book and Snack Mobile:  Summer Mobile Pantry for Children. No sign-up. No requirements. Always free.
